transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, kaun bol rahe sir?
Customer: Yeah hi Lakshmi mam right?
[inaudible]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: No sir, hello.
Customer: Hello, yeah hi mam very good morning this is me Ramesh calling from IndiaMART head office branch right actually your company is running with this life for my India right.
Customer: Yes sir.
Customer: Shree Grow for my India private limited.
Executive: Yes yes yes yes yes. So actually yesterday I got the notification about the video meeting right. So that is the basically reason I will call you. So can we do the video meeting?
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Sir will not available sir. You can make a call afternoon sir.
Customer: By what time?
Customer: After 2 p.m sir.
Executive: Okay no issues. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to schedule a video meeting.

- Customer says the concerned person is unavailable.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after 2 p.m.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None
